channel.title: When People logg in

item.title: When People logg in
item.dc:creator: @Jessie_Feil Jessie Feil
item.description:
@Jessie_Feil wrote:

This happens when it is trying too establish a Connection too another Forums Database/ Another Database period, and it can’t access it.
[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: When People logg in
item.dc:creator: @xJavac xJavac
item.description:
@xJavac wrote:

Native^:

I think this happens if you don’t have SQL installed, not sure.

This happens when it is trying too establish a Connection too another Forums Database/ Another Database period, and it can’t access it.

Read full topic

item.title: When People logg in
item.dc:creator: @F4k4-G F4k4-G
item.description:
@F4k4-G wrote:

Well i had same error, nothing to worry about.

Ppl can still join, its just annoying…

Read full topic

item.title: When People logg in
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

I think this happens if you don’t have SQL installed, not sure.

Read full topic

item.title: When People logg in
item.dc:creator: @xJavac xJavac
item.description:
@xJavac wrote:

Just prevent mysql from even starting in your Server class.

Read full topic

item.title: When People logg in
item.dc:creator: @F4k4-G F4k4-G
item.description:
@F4k4-G wrote:

gives it a problem?

cuz if it doesnt give any problem with logging in etc.

I think its useless, u will be able to login, even when u get that error.

Read full topic
